      • invoke

        public void invoke(Condition condition)
        Description copied from class: BaseCondition
        Method for user to invoke special columns

        USAGE:

        We can iterator all the fields which will be considered, and handle the condition object according to the fields' values.

        WARN:

        When you deal with joined columns, please put then into condition entity with JoinedProperty entity.

        Overrides:
        invoke in class BaseCondition
        Parameters:
        condition - conditions that to be considered
        See Also:
        Condition, JoinedProperty
